amendment.description: To prevent consideration of drilling in the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge in a fast-track budget reconciliation bill.

vote.text: Amendment SA 272 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 48. Record Vote Number: 59.

action.text: Amendment SA 272 proposed by Senator Boxer. (consideration: CR S3855-3874; text: CR S3855) To prevent consideration of drilling in the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge in a fast-track budget reconciliation bill.
